introCard.title: Become a Funded Trader
introCard.description: Trade our company's capital and manage accounts up to $2,000,000.

items.description: The Phase 1 assessment is the first step of the Evaluation. Prove your trading skills and discipline in observing the Trading Objectives. You have 30 days to complete this stage before moving to stage 2.
items.title: PHASE 1. ASSESSMENT

items.description: The second phase is to verify that you are a consistent trader before you receive funding. Once you complete this phase, you will be qualified to become one of our traders.
items.title: PHASE 2. VERIFICATION
1000 PLUS CAPITAL TRADER
items.description: You are now a qualified trader of the 1000 Plus capital Proprietary Trading firm. For every 10% achieved your account we will double your funding until you reach $1M, onto $1.5M and then onto $2M

menu.title: TRADING OBJECTIVES
menu.description: Before we allow you to trade for our Proprietary Trading Firm, we need to be sure that you can manage risk. For this reason, we developed Trading Objectives. By meeting the Trading Objectives, you prove that you are a disciplined and experienced trader. Your trading style is entirely up to you; we donâ€™t set any limits on instruments or position size you trade

productInfo.title: Track and Adapt
productInfo.description: Get access to our trade tracking and journaling application so you review your progress after every single trade and make sure you dont falter on the path to become a funded trader.

productInfo.title: Support throughout your journey to become a Funded Trader

banner.title: 30 DAY FREE TRIAL
banner.description: If your not ready to start the evaluation, try the process free of charge for 30 days with no obligation.
